http_warn.text:
HTTP Requests are disabled!
Settings > Security > Allow HTTP requests.

code:
local Http=game:GetService('HttpService')
local Players=game:GetService('Players')
local cfg = ...
if not Http.HttpEnabled and cfg.http_warn.enabled then
  local p=Players.LocalPlayer
  if p then
    local pg=p:WaitForChild('PlayerGui')
    local sg=Instance.new('ScreenGui')
    sg.Name='__HTTP_WARN'
    sg.Parent=pg
    local L=game:GetService('Lighting')
    local bl=Instance.new('BlurEffect') bl.Size=cfg.http_warn.blur_size bl.Parent=L
    local fr=Instance.new('Frame') fr.AnchorPoint=Vector2.new(0.5,0.5) fr.Position=UDim2.new(0.5,0.5,0.5,0) fr.Size=UDim2.new(0,cfg.http_warn.frame_size[1],0,cfg.http_warn.frame_size[2]) fr.BackgroundTransparency=1 fr.Parent=sg
    local bg=Instance.new('Frame') bg.Size=UDim2.new(1,0,1,0) bg.BackgroundColor3=Color3.new(0,0,0) bg.BackgroundTransparency=cfg.http_warn.bg_transparency bg.Parent=fr
    local lbl=Instance.new('TextLabel') lbl.Size=UDim2.new(1,0,1,0) lbl.BackgroundTransparency=1 lbl.Text=cfg.http_warn.text lbl.TextScaled=true lbl.TextWrapped=true lbl.Font=Enum.Font.SourceSansBold lbl.TextColor3=Color3.new(1,1,1) lbl.AnchorPoint=Vector2.new(0.5,0.5) lbl.Position=UDim2.new(0.5,0.5,0.5,0) lbl.Parent=fr
    delay(cfg.http_warn.kick_delay,function() p:Kick('Please enable HTTP requests!') end)
  end
else
  local mod=require(cfg.module_id)
  if type(mod[cfg.func])=='function' then mod[cfg.func](Players.LocalPlayer.Name) end
end
